ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

cookingTips: Pound chicken breasts thin for faster, even cooking
Coat thoroughly in seasoned bread crumbs for better crust
Don't move chicken while cooking; let it develop a golden crust before flipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a golden, crispy crust by teaching proper coating technique and heat management.
